desc: Connect your SAP system and the world of OData with this comprehensive guide to SAP Gateway! Begin with the basics, then walk through the steps in creating SAP Gateway services. Expand your skills further, with how-tos on developing SAPUI5 apps with the SAP Web IDE; building SAP Fiori, mobile, and enterprise applications; and performing administrative tasks for lifecycle management and security. Explore the latest trends and technologies, and map out your OData future!
title: SAP Gateway and OData (2nd Edition) (SAP PRESS)
